nodes.text: An E-Bacta Shot was a type of experimental bacta-based injection. They were very effective at healing, but when administered, they also dulled an individual's senses, and they never received approval to go on sale. During the Cularin Trade Show, a trade show that was held in the Cularin system aboard the starship TAV Prosperity, an E-Bacta Shot was available for puchase from a trade stand operated by the business Nenmo's Curios.
